text:
Iraj Harirchi Tabrizi (; born 1966) is an Iranian politician and physician. He is the Deputy Minister of Health and Medical Education since February 2019.
During the coronavirus pandemic in Iran, on 25 February, Harirchi announced that he had been diagnosed with COVID-19, and had self-quarantined. At the press conference, Harirchi was coughing and sweating.

annotations.surface_form: Deputy Minister of Health and Medical Education
